ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 8 SMs x 128 CUDA cores/SM x 2 (FMA) = 2048 FP32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp16: 8 SMs x 128 CUDA cores/SM x 2 (FMA) x 4 (packed FP16) = 8192 FP16 ops/clock, or via Tensor Cores
ops_per_clock_notes.tf32: 8 SMs x 4 Tensor Cores/SM x 128 ops/TC/clock = 4096 TF32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 8 SMs x 4 Tensor Cores/SM x 512 ops/TC/clock = 16384 INT8 ops/clock

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at boost_clock_mhz. Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate per-profile peaks.
l2_cache_bandwidth_notes: Estimated based on Ampere L2 design. 8 SMs share ~1MB L2. Measured ~31-68 GB/s at 8MB (cache miss) confirms L2 is smaller.

MAXNSUPER.notes: Boost clock, may hit thermal/current limits

notes: Ampere GPU with 1024 CUDA cores (8 SMs) and 32 Tensor Cores (Gen 3). Shares unified LPDDR5 memory with CPU in Jetson Orin Nano SoC.
